TopicTitle: The Story Of The Kerbals Youtube Gampelay

Articles.Content:
Hello guys and girls!!!

Kerbal Space Program is the best game i have ever played,and it inspired me to start recording gameplay videos!

I will tell the kerbals side of the story as they conquer space!!!

I am kind of new in this so any suggestions please feel free to comment and tell me!

If you guys are looking for some gameplay videos of KSP with a storyline please checkout my youtube channel:

http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxUSG7agKSjOaUExSyEic9g

If you like what you see please like and subscribe and all credit goes to Squad for making this amazing game!!!

Thanx guys

Nice video. Liked the story mode narration, but needed some alarms going off or something when the flight had the emergency . For some reason I had my doubts as to the rocket getting off the ground. Then I remembered how much mass the rockomax engines can lift. looking forward to the next "chapter"
